cleaned_text: Naturopathic medicine focuses on the healing power of nature. Naturopathic medicine blends centuries-old natural, time-tested, non-toxic therapies with current advances in the study of health, covering every aspect of family health from prenatal to geriatric care. With so many Ayurvedic alternatives out there, you may be inspired to take charge of your health. The best way to get yourself into it is starting small and gradually making incremental changes to create a lifestyle that cultivates health and well-being. The Institute for Ayurvedic and Naturopathic Therapies opened its doors in April 2006 as the only practice in Connecticut at the time to combine traditional Ayurvedic practice with research backed Naturopathic medicine.
